text.div: This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/NCPDPDispensedAsWrittenOrProductSelectionCode defines many codes, but they are not represented here

name: NCPDPDispensedAsWrittenOrProductSelectionCode
title: NCPDP Dispense As Written (DAW)/Product Selection Code
publisher: National Council for Prescription Drug Programs

contact.name: National Council for Prescription Drug Programs

description: Code indicating whether or not the prescriber's instructions regarding generic substitution were followed.
